title: Disconnected from chat entirely.
body: No groups, no Friends, not even notifications. I can't even invite friends to play.

replies.body:
Are you still having this issue? If so, I recommend following our [connection guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to confirm that your local network settings are in good standing since this issue is often caused by a poor connection to our servers.

Let me know if you were able to resolve this with those steps.
It seems to have resolved itself. Thanks for replying though.
